title: KREMA ZA ROKE BIO OLIVA, ALKMENE, 75ML

contact-information.kontakt:: Fraktal d.o.o., Cesta Andreja Bitenca 68, 1000 Ljubljana

ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA (WATER), GLYCERIN, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERYL STEARATE, ISOPROPYL PALMITATE, DICAPRYLYL ETHER, ALLANTOIN, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), SODIUM CETEARYL SULFATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, LIMONENE, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE.
